answers.answer: I would wait! My doc with my first convinced me to get induced. Because my body wasn't ready I had to have a csection and never got to experience natural birth. Think about it hard before you decide. :) good luck and congrats.
When you are induced it's much more painful. Let your body do the work. Baby knows when he's ready to come & it will be less painful.

My first, my water broke I went 27 hours of labor with mild pain. My 2 others I was induced & it was painful I was trying to crawl off the bed going upward. This last one I'm going to let labor come on its own. So I can enjoy the last moments of pregnancy

I was induced at 39 weeks because of preeclampsia. I pray I can be induced again because idk what naturally induced labor is! Ahh! Weirdly enough because of my heart problems I was bedridden the entire labor and delivery so I couldn't leave my bed or adjust to relieve pain. I'd rather be induced because I know what to expect. I'm not sure what to expect with a broken water or plug. I'd probably think my dog peed! Push it out to 41.weeks I'd say. Maybe you'll have a fast natural non induced delivery!

This is my 3rd due the 29th my first 2 were inductions (Dr's ccall) and I LOVED it so much that I elected to have one this time and go in @ 6:30AM Monday (5 days til due date) to do so :) both times less than 10 hrs from check in to holding baby! Not to say this one will be the same everyone and every pregnancy is different good luck with your decision
Thank u so much ladies I don't know why my doc wants to induce me if I have no medical condition.  . Thank u I have a lot to think bout.
My first 2 babies were induced. They were painful and labor lasted 8 hrs. Had an epidural with both. My 3rd happened on its own and was natural and took 3 hrs. Id wait if I were you.
I would wait til 41 weeks personally. Induction often leads to csection esp when body and baby were not ready.
I wanted to get induced b4 i hit 41weeks but the hospital that im going to has a strict policy n they only induce when ur 41weeks so tues im getting induced.

question: So I'm 39w1d. My doctor checked me yesterday and said that if I was dilated 2cm he was gonna induced me. But I haven't dilated.  So he said that if baby wasn't born by my due date next Monday 24th that hes going to induced me next Wednesday. My husband is now telling me that I shouldn't get induced till week 41 or 42 since I've had a healthy pregnancy no health issues or anything like that. So do u ladies think
title: When to get induced? ?
